Package uk.ac.glasgow.jagora

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BuyOrder
    Extends the definition of order behaviour for comparing buy orders.
    Market
    Defines behaviour for trading in a single stock type.
    Order
    Defines operations for orders on a stock exchange.
    OrderBook<O extends Order & java.lang.Comparable<O>>
    Defines the general behaviours for managing stock market orders in an order book.
    SellOrder
    Extends the definition of order behaviour for comparing sell orders.
    Stock
    Provides a simple representation of a stock type.
    StockExchange
    Defines the behaviour of a stock exchange on which a variety of stocks can be traded using different types of buy and sell orders.
    TickEvent<T>
    Provides a general interface for denoting timed events.
    Trade
    Defines the general behaviour for a proposed trade between one buy and one sell order.
    Trader
    Defines the behaviour of a trader who places and cancels orders on a stock exchange.
    World
    Provides the behaviour for managing timed events in a stock exchange world.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    TradeException
    A thrown trade exception indicates a trade that could not be satisfied, either because a trade was invalid for the associated buy or sell order; or because one of the associated buying or selling traders could not satisfy the trade within their available resources.
